attributes.action: Give legacy benefits like ESA the much needed £20 uplift
attributes.additional_details: People on legacy benefits like contributions based ESA were denied the much needed £20 during the current pandemic.
attributes.background: People on legacy benefits like contributions based ESA were denied the much needed £20 during the current pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Keep the £20pw Universal Credit lifeline and extend to those on legacy benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572128

Extend any Universal Credit uplifts to legacy benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570558
